summary: This bill, the Air Traffic Control Workforce Development Act of 2025, aims to improve air traffic controller training and address workforce needs. It focuses on the Collegiate Training Initiative (CTI) program, providing grant funding, curriculum improvements, and potential benefits for instructors. The bill also includes measures for facility equipment improvements, retention bonuses for controllers, and mental health support. Additionally, it mandates a report on the Airport Non-cooperative Surveillance Radar (ANSR) program.
